trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGFSTNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF2_00195_MOBHUNTERF1F2_000_1<tab>You have the aspect of an adventurer. Let me guess─you stalk an elite mark.
TEXT_REGFSTNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF2_00195_A1_000_2<tab>Tell me about the rank B elite mark. (Stinging Sophie)
TEXT_REGFSTNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF2_00195_A1_000_3<tab>Tell me about the rank A elite mark. (Melt)
TEXT_REGFSTNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF2_00195_A1_000_4<tab>Tell me about the rank S elite mark. (Wulgaru)
TEXT_REGFSTNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF2_00195_MOBHUNTERF1F2_000_10<tab>I'm what some term a hunter<var 1F /var>scholar. I not only pursue dangerous elite marks, but make a study of them.
TEXT_REGFSTNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF2_00195_MOBHUNTERF1F2_000_11<tab>It's well worth the effort, my young friend. Every elite mark is worth a goodly number of Allied Seals.
TEXT_REGFSTNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF2_00195_MOBHUNTERF1F2_000_12<tab>Still, their ferity cannot be underprized. Whatever your quarry, ask me your questions before you go in foolish pursuit.

TEXT_REGFSTNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF2_00195_MOBHUNTERF1F2_000_13<tab>Elite marks are ranked according to danger, you see. The most dangerous are rank S marks, and those carry a double risk: hard to find and hard to survive.
TEXT_REGFSTNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF2_00195_MOBHUNTERF1F2_000_20<tab>“Stinging Sophie. Fattened on the honeybees of Fullflower Comb, this giant hornet inspires both disgust and complacency.

TEXT_REGFSTNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF2_00195_MOBHUNTERF1F2_000_21<tab>“Contrary to what its excess of embonpoint suggests, this grotesquerie is agile enough to evade its would<var 1F /var>be slayers, and instead give them a deadly stitch with its needle-sharp stinger.”
TEXT_REGFSTNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF2_00195_MOBHUNTERF1F2_000_30<tab>“Melt. Unfathomable in its concoction and unspeakable in its coagulation, this voidsent has its origins in a sylph's jest.”

TEXT_REGFSTNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF2_00195_MOBHUNTERF1F2_000_31<tab>The codex speaks the truth, my young friend. Gaze overlong at its sucking tumescence and something inside you will die...and it's put me off flummery for good.

TEXT_REGFSTNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF2_00195_MOBHUNTERF1F2_000_40<tab>“Wulgaru, the false tree. Not a few poachers have vanished after being bound overnight to this vampiric man<var 1F /var>eater by unsuspecting Wood Wailers.
TEXT_REGFSTNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF2_00195_MOBHUNTERF1F2_000_41<tab>“Wulgaru is also drawn by noise and commotion, breaking its arboreal disguise to feast on the blood of its favorite prey: man.”

TEXT_REGFSTNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF2_00195_MOBHUNTERF1F2_000_42<tab>In other words, go quietly and fight stealthily, adventurer. If a tree comes alive in the forest, you're not likely to notice until too late.
